I want to thank all the people who created documentation of Bakalari API on Github. Without them, you wouldn\'t be reading this message now. The source api is below. Thank you very much! Feel free to follow me, share or check source code
Usage requirements Agree This apps stores some your personal data like username, password and school. App also collects some data about usage using Google\'s Firebase analytics. This data are anonymised and will also include your town and school (you can switch it off in settings later). I am just interested to know how my app eventually grows ;) Settings
